text: no. but it was okay. i mean, when i was little i'd think maybe my parents would change their mind, and surprise me with a party, like this one birthday i came home from my cello lesson, and i saw a lot of strange cars parked out front, and when i got to the door i could hear people whispering, and i could smell german chocolate cake, which is my favourite.
